successes.title: Ministry of Supply: The Future of Dress Shirts.
successes.description: Ministry of Supply is launching the Apollo dress shirt, building performance tech into classic style. It's from space, yes outer space.

Pledges.description: First, we're permanently indebted to you for your support - thank you!  Second, a “Ministry of Supply” branded notebook - as tough as our shirts and also made in America.  A pair of stainless steel collar stays and a pair of plastic collar stays.

Our Performance Base Layer - an incredible match for The Apollo shirt, for those that like a layer beneath.  Made from a soft polyester, the shirt is 100% moisture wicking and odor controlling.  The Performance Base Layer will outperform anything in your closet today.

Our new and game-changing Thermo-Regulatory Base Layer, in black.  This base layer is robotically knit, so we can use thermal imaging to change the knit pattern of the shirt seamlessly- in simple terms, your underarms and back are vented, while a tighter knit across the chest fights “nipping” - with no seams in the body.  In addition, you get the $10 bucket with this reward too!

Our current Agent shirt in White (also a premium dress shirt) - similar to the Apollo, but minus the NASA heat-regulation technology.  Your choice of cut (slim, classic) and size. A solid dress shirt that is ready to ship shortly after the campaign ends!  And as always, we throw in a pair of stainless steel collar stays.

The Apollo Shirt: a premium dress shirt with our proprietary Apollo fabric blend - your choice of cut (slim, classic), color, and size.  Also, your name and picture on our site as a supporter (if you want, of course) - and we’ll also throw in a pair of collar stays.
Duo Deal - Everything from the $95 and $25 prizes

Premium Package.  Perfect for a Father's day gift, or to get yourself something special.  One Apollo shirt, one Performance Base Layer, and one Thermo-Regulatory Base Layer.  If you want it as a Father's day gift, we'll send out a card so you have something to give while waiting for your shirts.
"Red, White & Blue - a 4th of July special" - a blue Apollo shirt, a pink Apollo shirt and our white base layer.  Wear your USA pride!

Three of The Apollo shirts ($95 reward, each), in your choice of cut,  color, and size. Your name and picture on our site as a supporter (if you want, of course) - and 3 pairs of stainless steel collar stays, of course.
Weekend to weekend....You have every day of the week covered.  5 Apollo Shirts and 5 Performance Base Layers.
Everything from $250 bucket + monogrammed (if you want) + custom fit (taking your measurements, etc.), and your name and picture on our site as a supporter (if you want, of course)

$1,000 bucket + we’ll name the next limited edition shirt after you (or an adapted version of your name), or you get to pick the color of our next batch - we’ll make a limited edition run, in your honor, and your name and picture on our site as a supporter (if you want, of course). Really, you can propose just about anything here - and we’ll probably accept!
